entry.title: Timeouts When Maintaining Large Business Roles in S/4HANA Public Cloud (3SL â€“ CBC)
entry.content:
Dear SAP Community,

In our S/4HANA Public Cloud 3SL (CBC) Development and Test tenants, we are experiencing persistent issues when maintaining a large business role that includes all available business catalogs (currently more than 1,400).

Whenever we try to update an existing super-user role that already contains approximately 1,000 catalogs, or when we attempt to create a new role containing all catalogs through the â€œMaintain Business Rolesâ€ Fiori app, we receive TimeOut or RunTime errors.

We use this wide-access role for key users to quickly determine whether issues raised by stakeholdersâ€”such as after activating new scope items or after upgradesâ€”are related to missing authorizations.

I would appreciate hearing from anyone who has encountered similar challenges. How did you resolve or work around these performance limitations?

Additionally, is there a way to build such a role using the â€œCreate From Templateâ€ option instead of manually adding each catalog through the UI? If so, where can the template be found and which fields are required for a successful upload?

Thank you in advance for your insights.

Kind regards,
Mike van Ingen

entry.title: Handling RFC Queue Errors in SAP EWM Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

In SAP EWM Public Cloud, you can view and reprocess RFC queue errors directly from the Warehouse Monitor. Pending queues are visible there, and you can reprocess them once the underlying issue is resolved.

The real problem starts when the error has no actual fix. For example, an inbound delivery that was already put away, but the logistics period was afterward shifted. This leaves you with an RFC error you cannot resolve, and when you open the queue details there is no option to influence the data container, such as adjusting the posting date. Rejecting the queue does not work either.

Transaction /SCWM/ERP_STOCKCHECK technically exists, but since the queue is still present, you cannot clean up the situation through that check. The only app that seems remotely comparable to transaction SQM2 is F5427 (Manage Queue), yet it does not display anything relevant here.

Question
How can these unresolvable RFC queue errors be corrected in SAP EWM Public Cloud?

Thanks

entry.title: How to set up billing job for the last WD of the month
entry.content: We are on Public Cloud and we use Schedule Billing Creation for Preliminary Billing Documents app to schedule daily jobs. But we would like to set up a recurring job on every last Working Day of a month and I cannot see any option like that. When I choose End of Month there is no way to choose last WD. Only '- some amount of days' but not 0. Any idea how to set it up?

entry.title: SAP Public Cloud ADT Package deleted
entry.content:
Dear All

While working over SAP Public Cloud using Eclipse ADT , we connected it with Git to move the package to another project but due to some unknown reason instead of exporting and importing the package from Git to new projects, its imported back to original project and now many files, applications , cds , https services are inconsistent and many are deleted.

Any possibility to retrieve it back. Like if we can export and import the whole package from QAS back to development system.

entry.title: Local Currency change impact on Group reporting
entry.content:
We are planning to change the functional currency from local currency to Group currency USD for some of the consolidation units in the ledger Company code settings for local reporting decided by the management.

We need to understand its implication on the Group reporting consolidation unit currency settings which is same as functional currency and the data is transferred from Universal Journal.

Since the data transferred from universal journal is so far in GBP and the data in group reporting is already updated as GBP if we change the currency to USD in GR CU, we would like to understand how the transaction data in group reporting presently in local currency GBP will be converted to USD and how the balances LC is carried forward.


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: Alternative BOM as a component
entry.content:
I have to deal with inquiry from my client as below and I'm stuck with it. Please help me if you know.

Their finished product has multilevel BOM. Last level or any level can include a size-variable or configurable material. However they do not want to use Variant Configuration and I am trying to use alternative BOM for them.

For example:

1. Finished goods A, alternative BOM 1 has semi finished goods A1 and A2. 
Semi finished goods A1, alternative BOM 1 has raw material B1 and C1

2. Finished goods A, alternative BOM 2 has semi finished goods A1 and A2. 
Semi finished goods A1, alternative BOM 2 has raw material B2 and C1

My problem is, the last layer BOM (A1 in above example) has multiple BOM alternatives, but the next layer does not pickup no alternative other than alternative 1.

Please help me how to set up.

SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition

entry.title: Custom Tax Condition Type SAP Public Cloud Customer Project Plan
entry.content:
Dear All i want to ask about custom condition type for app customer project plan in sap public cloud

in the SO the custom condition type already can be found 

but when i create billing the condition type can't be found

the configuration is still standard , i only add another condition type into the pricing procedure

is there some missing with the configuration or is it different between SO and Billing when we talk about Customer Project Plan ?

 

 

Thankyou

entry.title: How to Create Data via BOI from Custom SAPUI5 App in S/4HANA Public Cloud?
entry.content:
Hello experts,

Iâ€™m working on an SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud scenario where I need to create new data (entity instances) from a custom SAPUI5 application.
The app is already deployed as a tile in the Fiori Launchpad and is consuming an OData service that I exposed through ABAP Development Tools (ADT) in Eclipse. This OData service is based on a custom CDS view.

Now, I want to perform create operations â€” for example, creating a Production Order Confirmation.
I found the following Business Object Interface (BOI) on the SAP API Business Hub:
ğŸ‘‰ I_PRODUCTIONORDCONFIRMATIONTP

However, Iâ€™m not sure about the best practice for implementing this BOI interface in the Public Cloud environment:

  • Should I create a custom RAP (RESTful ABAP Programming Model) behavior definition that consumes the BOI interface?

  • Or is there another recommended integration pattern for invoking BOIs from a custom application?

  • How can I trigger the BOI create operation from my custom UI5 app (which currently consumes only my custom CDS service)?

Iâ€™d appreciate any guidance, examples, or references on how to correctly implement a BOI-based data creation scenario in S/4HANA Public Cloud.

Thank you in advance!
Tadeas

entry.title: Linking Custom CDS View to Custom Field in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hi Team,

Iâ€™ve created a Custom CDS View with the scenario set as â€œExternal API,â€ which is based on the I_BankAccountDEX data source to retrieve bank account entries.

Separately, Iâ€™ve defined a Custom Field using the Bank Account Master Data (I_BANKACCOUNTTP) business context via the Custom Fields Fiori app.

However, Iâ€™m unable to see this Custom CDS View listed in the Custom Field configuration, which prevents me from linking the two. Is there a way to associate this Custom CDS View with the Custom Field or vice versa so that the field can be accessed through the CDS View API and integrated with the existing business objects?

Looking forward to your guidance.

entry.title: Manage multiple add on fields under one sales order items
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

We would like to seek for your advice how to proceed with development.

In Manage Sales Order version 2 app, there is a requirement whereby in one sales order item, it is required to maintain lot no.1, lot qty.1, lot no.2, lot qty.3.... and etc. up to lot no.30.

For example:

Item 10: Product A = 1000kg

Lot no.1: A0001= 300kg

Lot no.2: A0002 = 500kg

Lot no.3: A0003 = 700kg

Lot no.4:A0004 = 500kg

total of lot qty will be equal to sales order line item qty

Ideally, we would like to create a table under Sales Order line item to create 1 to many relationship.

However, it seems not feasible.

Could we get advice how to proceed as we would like to avoid too many add-on fields in the Sales Order app?

Thank You.

Regards,

Chin Yee

entry.title: Report related to stock retained period.
entry.content:
Dear Commnity,
I'm in charge of preparing SAP Public Cloud project.

I want to check the how long has it been since we post goods receipt for material batch.
I'm able to check the final goods receipt date related to batch.
But I want to see the automatically calculate dates after goods receipt.
For example) I posted goods receipts for Material A and Batch 1 2025/11/01 and In the report side, I want to see the date 10 for Material A and Batch1

Is there any standard report function in the SAP Public cloud?

Kindly advise,
Best Regards

entry.title: S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition: Factoring Process without Dedicated Scope Item - App and Process Guida
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

I have a question regarding the implementation of a factoring process in S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition.

**Background:**
- Customer uses 2-party factoring (immediate payment type)
- Customer wants to use standard functionality WITHOUT the dedicated Factoring scope item (due to additional cost)
- Manual workaround using standard apps and postings is preferred

**Business Flow:**
1. Invoice issued to customer: Â¥1,000,000 (accounts receivable created)
2. Factoring company purchases receivable: Cash received Â¥900,000 (Â¥100,000 factoring fee)
3. Customer pays to our bank account: Â¥1,000,000 (we hold this on behalf of factoring company)
4. We transfer to factoring company: Â¥1,000,000

**Proposed Accounting Entries:**
1. AR creation (Feb 10):
DR: Accounts Receivable (Customer account) 1,000,000
CR: Revenue 1,000,000
â†’ App: Customer Invoicing (F-22 equivalent)

2. Factoring purchase & cash receipt (Mar 10):
DR: Bank 900,000
DR: Factoring fee expense 100,000
CR: Accounts Receivable (Customer account) 1,000,000
â†’ App: Manual Journal Entry (FB01 equivalent)?

3. Receipt from customer (Apr 15):
DR: Bank 1,000,000
CR: Deposits payable 1,000,000
â†’ App: Post Incoming Payments (F-28 equivalent)?

4. Payment to factoring company (Apr 16):
DR: Deposits payable 1,000,000
CR: Bank 1,000,000
â†’ App: Post Outgoing Payments (F-53 equivalent)?

5. Clearing of "Deposits payable"
â†’ App: Manual G/L Account Clearing (F1579)

**Questions:**
1. Is this flow technically feasible in S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition? Additionally, are the App IDs I mentioned (F-22, FB01, F-28, F-53, F1579) correct for S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, or should I use different apps?

2. Specifically, can we clear customer-specific AR (created via customer invoicing app) directly with a manual journal entry including the factoring fee difference as shown in entry 2?

3. If this approach is not possible, what alternative process would you recommend? Please include:
- Which apps to use (with App IDs if possible)
- Accounting entries for each step

Any guidance would be greatly appreciated!

Best regards

entry.title: Cannot access F1273 as well as F6748(CBC)
entry.content:
Premise:
Two individuals, A and B, accessed the application, but only B was able to access it.
At this time, A has all the permissions that B has, and also has more permissions than B.
Additionally, no particular restrictions are set for each role.
The timing when the error began: During "Manage Business Role Changes After Upgrade," multiple business roles were viewing the same business role template, and only one was retained while the others were deleted. Users assigned to the deleted roles were reassigned to the remaining business role. This impact is affecting user A more than B.

Question
Some users cannot access CBC apps like  Automatic Account Determination (F1273) and Define Financial Statement Versions in Global Hierarchies (F6748).
Please tell me the possible causes and solutions.

entry.title: Standard PDF Output Capabilities for Japanese Statutory Reports in S/4HANA Public Edition
entry.content:
Hi Community,
We are implementing SAP S/4HANA Public Edition for a Japanese manufacturing company. Could you please advise if the following reports can be output as PDF using standard functionality (without custom development)?

1,Japanese Corporate Tax Form - Schedule 16 (åˆ¥è¡¨16) - Fixed asset depreciation details for tax filing
2,Japanese Depreciable Assets Tax Return (å„Ÿå´è³‡ç”£ç¨ç”³å‘Šæ›¸) - Municipal tax filing for fixed assets
3,Customer Invoice - With Japanese format requirements
4,Payment Notice/Remittance Advice (æ”¯æ‰•é€šçŸ¥æ›¸) - Vendor payment notification

For items 1 & 2, we understand these are Japan-specific statutory reports. Are there any:

Standard localizations available?
Recommended workarounds using standard output management?
SAP Document Compliance solutions that cover these?

Any insights would be greatly appreciated!

entry.title: S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition: Replication Mode in Communication Arrangement
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

i have a question regarding the replication model setting in the s4 Public Cloud. 

What does the Parameter Replication Mode "I - Initial Replication" in the Communication Arrangement( e.g. 0008 - Business Partner Replication) do ?

Does this also trigger a single "Initial Load" similiar to the App "Replicate by Replication Model" with mode "Initialization"

I did not find any specific information on the SAP Help.

Thanks in Advance

Simon

entry.title: How to add a new admin task to the Manage My Timesheet app
entry.content:
The user would like to know if it's possible to add a new admin charge-code/task to the SAP timesheets called "Down-time", or "Excess Capacity". 

As per the requestor they require a timesheet task that will have no impact (still treated as admin/unutilized).  However, this request will allow them to separate downtime from time spent on required admin activity.  


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

Annika
